import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin-login', templateUrl: './admin-login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin-login.component.css'] }) export class AdminLoginComponent { constructor(private router:Router) { } adminId: any; adminName: any; emailAddress: any; GoHome(){ this.router.navigate(['/home']); } } U&G Login
